path.description: The path to create the component.

name.x-prompt: What should be the name of the component?

displayBlock.description: Specifies if the stylesheet base will contain `{ display: block; }`.

inlineTemplate.description: Specifies if the template will be in the ts file.

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

type.description: Adds a developer-defined type to the filename, in the format "name.type.ts".

skipTests.description: When true, does not generate a test file.

flat.description: When true, creates the new files at the top level of the current project.

skipImport.description: When true, does not import this component into the owning NgModule.

selector.description: The HTML selector to use for this component.

module.description: Allows specification of the declaring module.

export.description: When true, the declaring NgModule exports this component.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the component.

onInit.description: When false, the OnInit implementation will be skipped. If explicitly set to true and combined with `minimal: true`, this setting overrides the `minimal` setting.

onDestroy.description: When false, the OnDestroy implementation will be skipped. If explicitly set to true and combined with `minimal: true`, this setting overrides the `minimal` setting.

construct.description: When false, the constructor will be omitted. If explicitly set to true and combined with `minimal: true`, this setting overrides the `minimal` setting.

minimal.description: When true, the constructor, OnInit, and OnDestroy implementations will be skipped. Can be overridden by setting `onInit`, `onDestroy`, or `construct` to true individually.
